name: CoolStory RPG
description:
Since birth you have been training in your prison home, enhancing your combat and magical ability to one day embrace your destiny. Suddenly, in the middle of the night, you hear a loud yell commanding you to come out, today might be the day.

Play as The Prisoner as they discover the land and unite the world for this mysterious threat. Every decision you make matters in shaping the world, shape your world, and play out the mystery. How will your world look at the end?

Level one demo available now.
